Posts.Content: Aug 18, 2011 05:29PM Sandysoo wrote: Hi Guys I had round 3 of chemo last Thurs......3 more to go. Im doing really well. No side effects, well maybe metal mouth, but its not that bad. The steroids freak me out a bit.....they're horrible. Im like Garfield pinned to a wall. Hope you guys are doing good.
Posts.Title: August 2011 chemo, anyone w/ me?! vtellen MizMarie
